name: Name
please_add_photo: Please add a photo to continue
take_photo_or_upload: Take a photo or upload from your device
delete_account_warning: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_account_description: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
deleting_wait: Please wait while we delete your account and all associated data.
deletion_success_desc: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.
deletion_error_desc: There was an error deleting your account.
reauth_required_desc: Your data has been deleted, but the account requires recent authentication to complete deletion.
reauth_required_note: Please log out and log back in, then try deleting your account again.
